title: Direct observation of the coherent precession of magnetic domain walls propagating along permalloy nanowires
title_cn: 直接观察沿坡莫合金纳米线传播的磁畴壁的相干进动
abstract: The dynamics of the motion of domain walls (DWs) in magnetic materials has been extensively explored theoretically. Depending on the driving force, conventionally magnetic field and, more recently, spin-polarized current, the propagation of DWs changes from a simple translation to more complex precessional modes. Experimentally, indirect evidence of this transition is found from a sudden drop in the wall’s velocity, but direct observation of the precessional modes is lacking. Here we show experimentally, using a combination of quasi-static and real-time measurement techniques, that DWs propagate along permalloy nanowires with a periodic variation in the chirality of the walls. The frequency of this oscillation is consistent with a precession of the propagating DW, increasing linearly with field according to the Larmor precession frequency. Current in the nanowire, large enough to significantly influence the DW velocity, has little effect on the precession frequency but can be used to adjust the phase of the wall’s precession. The highly coherent and reproducible motion of the DW revealed by our studies demonstrates that the DW is a well-defined macroscopic object whose phase is inextricably interlinked to the distance travelled by the DW.
abstract_cn: 磁性材料中畴壁（DW）运动的动力学已在理论上进行了广泛研究。取决于驱动力，常规磁场以及最近的自旋极化电流，DW的传播从简单的平移变为更复杂的进动模式。在实验中，可以从壁速突然下降中找到这种过渡的间接证据，但是缺乏对进动模式的直接观察。在这里，我们通过结合准静态和实时测量技术的实验表明，DW沿坡莫合金纳米线传播，且其壁的手性周期性变化。该振荡的频率与传播的DW的进动一致，并根据拉莫尔进动频率随磁场线性增加。纳米线中的电流足够大，可以显着影响DW速度，对旋进频率几乎没有影响，但可以用来调整壁旋进的相位。我们的研究揭示了DW的高度连贯和可再现的运动，表明DW是一个定义明确的宏观物体，其相位与DW的行进距离密不可分。

title: Local fluctuations in the ageing of a simple structural glass
title_cn: 简单结构玻璃老化的局部波动
abstract: The presence of dynamical heterogeneities—that is, nanometre-scale regions of molecules rearranging cooperatively at very different rates compared with the bulk—is increasingly being recognized as crucial to our understanding of the glass transition, from the non-exponential relaxation to the divergence of the relaxation times. Although recent experiments and simulations have observed their presence directly, a clear physical picture of their origin is still lacking. Here, we present the first detailed characterization of the statistics of local fluctuations in a simulation of the ageing of a continuous-space, quasi-realistic structural glass model. A possible physical mechanism for the origin of dynamical heterogeneities in the non-equilibrium dynamics of glassy systems predicts universal scaling of the probability distributions of two-time local fluctuations. We find that to a first approximation this scaling is indeed satisfied by our results. We propose to test our results using confocal microscopy and atomic force microscopy experiments.
abstract_cn: 动态异质性的存在，也就是说，与本体相比，分子的纳米级区域以非常不同的速率协同重排，这越来越多地被认为对于我们理解玻璃的转变至关重要。 -指数松弛到松弛时间的发散。尽管最近的实验和模拟已经直接观察到它们的存在，但是仍然缺乏它们起源的清晰的物理图像。在这里，我们介绍了在模拟连续空间，准真实结构玻璃模型的老化过程中对局部波动统计数据的首次详细表征。玻璃态系统非平衡动力学中动力学异质性起源的可能物理机制预测了两次局部波动概率分布的普遍定标。我们发现，从一阶近似值来看，我们的结果确实满足了这种缩放比例。我们建议使用共聚焦显微镜和原子力显微镜来测试结果。

title: Phase separation and suppression of critical dynamics at quantum phase transitions of MnSi and (Sr1−xCax)RuO3
title_cn: MnSi和（Sr1-xCax）RuO3的量子相变时的相分离和临界动力学抑制
abstract: Quantum phase transitions (QPTs) at zero temperature are generally studied by means of pressure or composition tuning. Volume-integrated probes such as neutron and magnetization measurements, as well as pressure uncertainties in NMR studies using powder specimens, however, have limited the characterization of magnetism and detection of discontinuous changes at QPTs. Overcoming these limitations, we carried out muon spin relaxation measurements that have a unique sensitivity to volume fractions of magnetically ordered and paramagnetic regions, and studied QPTs from itinerant helimagnet or ferromagnet to paramagnet transitions in MnSi (single crystal; varying pressure) and (Sr1−xCax)RuO3 (ceramic specimens; varying x). Our results provide the first clear evidence that both cases are associated with phase separation and suppression of dynamic critical behaviour, reveal slow dynamics of the ‘partial order’ diffuse spin correlations in MnSi above the critical pressure and suggest the possibility that a majority of QPTs in correlated electron systems involve first-order transitions and/or phase separation.
abstract_cn: 通常通过压力或组成调整研究零温度下的量子相变（QPT）。体积积分探针（例如中子和磁化强度测量）以及使用粉末样品进行的NMR研究中的压力不确定性，限制了磁性的表征和QPT处不连续变化的检测。为了克服这些限制，我们进行了对自旋有序和顺磁性区域的体积分数具有独特敏感性的μon自旋弛豫测量，并研究了从MnSi（单晶；压力变化）和（Sr < sub> 1＆＃8722; x </ sub> Ca <sub> x </ sub>）RuO <sub> 3 </ sub>（陶瓷标本；变化x）。我们的结果提供了第一个明确的证据，表明这两种情况均与相分离和动态关键行为的抑制有关，揭示了“偏序”的缓慢动力学。在临界压力以上的MnSi中弥散自旋相关性，并暗示相关电子系统中大多数QPT可能涉及一阶跃迁和/或相分离。</ p>

title: Quasiparticle dynamics in graphene
title_cn: 石墨烯中的准粒子动力学
abstract: The effectively massless, relativistic behaviour of graphene’s charge carriers—known as Dirac fermions—is a result of its unique electronic structure, characterized by conical valence and conduction bands that meet at a single point in momentum space (at the Dirac crossing energy). The study of many-body interactions amongst the charge carriers in graphene and related systems such as carbon nanotubes, fullerenes and graphite is of interest owing to their contribution to superconductivity and other exotic ground states in these systems. Here we show, using angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy, that electron–plasmon coupling plays an unusually strong role in renormalizing the bands around the Dirac crossing energy—analogous to mass renormalization by electron–boson coupling in ordinary metals. Our results show that electron–electron, electron–plasmon and electron–phonon coupling must be considered on an equal footing in attempts to understand the dynamics of quasiparticles in graphene and related systems.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯电荷载流子的有效无质量相对论行为被称为狄拉克费米子，是其独特的电子结构的结果，其特征是锥形价键和导带在单个点处相遇动量空间（在狄拉克横穿能量处）。石墨烯和相关系统（例如碳纳米管，富勒烯和石墨）中的电荷载体之间的多体相互作用研究由于其在这些系统中的超导性和其他奇异基态的贡献而受到关注。在这里，我们使用角度分辨光发射光谱法表明，电子等离子体耦合在重新规范Dirac穿越能量附近的能带中具有异常强大的作用，这类似于普通金属中通过电子玻色子耦合进行的质量重新规范化。我们的结果表明，在理解石墨烯和相关系统中准粒子的动力学过程中，必须平等考虑电子，电子，等离子体激元和电子与声子的耦合。

title: Controllable valley splitting in silicon quantum devices
title_cn: 硅量子器件中可控的谷值分裂
abstract: Silicon has many attractive properties for quantum computing, and the quantum-dot architecture is appealing because of its controllability and scalability. However, the multiple valleys in the silicon conduction band are potentially a serious source of decoherence for spin-based quantum-dot qubits. Only when a large energy splits these valleys do we obtain well-defined and long-lived spin states appropriate for quantum computing. Here, we show that the small valley splittings observed in previous experiments on Si–SiGe heterostructures result from atomic steps at the quantum-well interface. Lateral confinement in a quantum point contact limits the electron wavefunctions to several steps, and enhances the valley splitting substantially, up to 1.5 meV. The combination of electrostatic and magnetic confinement produces a valley splitting larger than the spin splitting, which is controllable over a wide range. These results improve the outlook for realizing spin qubits with long coherence times in silicon-based devices.
abstract_cn: 硅具有用于量子计算的许多吸引人的特性，并且量子点架构因其可控制性和可伸缩性而吸引人。但是，对于基于自旋的量子点量子位，硅导带中的多个波谷可能是退相干的重要来源。只有当大量的能量分裂这些谷时，我们才能获得适用于量子计算的定义明确且寿命长的自旋状态。在这里，我们显示了在Si＆＃8211; SiGe异质结构的先前实验中观察到的小山谷裂痕是由量子阱界面处的原子步长引起的。在量子点接触中的侧向限制将电子波函数限制为几个步骤，并显着增强了波谷分裂，直至1.5meV。静电和磁约束的结合产生了比自旋分裂更大的谷分裂，该谷分裂在很宽的范围内是可控的。这些结果改善了在基于硅的器件中实现具有长相干时间的自旋量子位的前景。

title: Dispersive superfluid-like shock waves in nonlinear optics
title_cn: 非线性光学中的弥散性超流体冲击波
abstract: In most classical fluids, shock waves are strongly dissipative, their energy being quickly lost through viscous damping. But in systems such as cold plasmas, superfluids and Bose–Einstein condensates, where viscosity is negligible or non-existent, a fundamentally different type of shock wave can emerge whose behaviour is dominated by dispersion rather than dissipation. Dispersive shock waves are difficult to study experimentally, and analytical solutions to the equations that govern them have only been found in one dimension (1D). By exploiting a well-known, but little appreciated, correspondence between the behaviour of superfluids and nonlinear optical materials, we demonstrate an all-optical experimental platform for studying the dynamics of dispersive shock waves. This enables us to observe the propagation and nonlinear response of dispersive shock waves, including the interaction of colliding shock waves, in 1D and 2D. Our system offers a versatile and more accessible means for exploring superfluid-like and related dispersive phenomena.
abstract_cn: 在大多数经典流体中，冲击波具有很强的耗散性，其能量会通过粘性阻尼迅速消失。但是，在诸如冷等离子体，超流体和Bose爱因斯坦冷凝物的系统中，粘度可忽略或不存在，则可能会出现根本不同类型的冲击波，其行为主要由分散而不是耗散决定。色散冲击波很难通过实验进行研究，控制它们的方程的解析解仅在一维（1D）中找到。通过利用超流体与非线性光学材料的行为之间的众所周知但鲜为人知的对应关系，我们展示了一种用于研究色散冲击波动力学的全光学实验平台。这使我们能够在一维和二维中观察色散冲击波的传播和非线性响应，包括碰撞冲击波的相互作用。我们的系统为探索类超流体及相关的色散现象提供了一种通用且更易于访问的方法。

title: Half-cycle cutoffs in harmonic spectra and robust carrier-envelope phase retrieval
title_cn: 谐波频谱中的半周期截止和可靠的载波-包络相位恢复
abstract: In recent years the use of high-order harmonic radiation to create and control events on attosecond timescales has grown at a phenomenal rate. With the use of carrier-envelope phase (CEP) stabilization and few-cycle laser systems it is possible to probe physical processes on unprecedented timescales. Here, we report the first experimental observation of high-harmonic emission at individual half-cycles of a laser pulse. We show that these half-cycle emissions are extremely sensitive to the CEP, providing a route to a new single-shot measurement technique of the CEP. We use this technique to measure the CEP of an 8.5 fs pulse at a centre wavelength of 800 nm with an accuracy of 20 as (1 as=1×10−18 s). With appropriate spatio-spectral filtering of the harmonic spectra, our calculations show that we can isolate emission from an individual half-cycle cutoff, which corresponds to a single isolated attosecond pulse of duration <300 as.
abstract_cn: 近年来，使用高次谐波辐射以秒为单位创建和控制事件的速度以惊人的速度增长。通过使用载波包络相位（CEP）稳定和少周期激光系统，可以在前所未有的时间尺度上探测物理过程。在这里，我们报告了在单个激光脉冲的半周期内高谐波发射的首次实验观察。我们表明，这些半周期排放对CEP极为敏感，这为CEP的新单次测量技术提供了一种途径。我们使用此技术在中心波长为800＆＃8201; nm的情况下测量8.5＆＃8201; fs脉冲的CEP，精度为20＆＃8201; as（1＆＃8201; as = 1＆＃215; 10 ＆＃8722; 18 ＆＃8201; s）。通过对谐波频谱进行适当的时空频谱滤波，我们的计算表明，我们可以将发射与单个半周期截止隔离开来，该截止对应于持续时间为＆＃160;＆lt; 300＆＃8201; as的单个孤立的阿秒脉冲。 >

title: Scaling of proton acceleration driven by petawatt-laser–plasma interactions
title_cn: 兆瓦-激光-等离子体相互作用驱动的质子加速度缩放
abstract: The possibility of using high-power lasers to generate high-quality beams of energetic ions is attracting large global interest. The prospect of using laser-accelerated protons in medicine attracts particular interest, as these schemes may lead to compact and relatively low-cost sources. Among the challenges remaining before these sources can be used in medicine is to increase the numbers and energies of the ions accelerated. Here, we extend the energy and intensity range over which proton scaling is experimentally investigated, up to 400 J and 6×1020 W cm−2 respectively, and find a slower proton scaling than previously predicted. With the aid of plasma-expansion simulation tools, our results suggest the importance of time-dependent and multidimensional effects in predicting the maximum proton energy in this ultrahigh-intensity regime. The implications of our new understanding of proton scaling for potential medical applications are discussed.
abstract_cn: 使用高功率激光产生高能离子束的可能性引起了全球的广泛关注。在医学上使用激光加速质子的前景引起了特别的兴趣，因为这些方案可能会导致紧凑且成本相对较低的来源。在将这些来源用于医学之前，仍然面临着众多挑战，其中包括增加被加速离子的数量和能量。在这里，我们扩展了能量和强度范围，对质子结垢进行了实验研究，范围达到了400＆＃8201 ; J和6＆＃215; 10 20 ＆＃8201; W＆＃8201; cm ＆＃8722; 2 ，并且发现质子缩放比以前预测的要慢。借助等离子膨胀模拟工具，我们的结果表明，在这种超高强度条件下，预测时间依赖的多维效应对于预测最大质子能量的重要性。讨论了我们对质子缩放的新理解对潜在医学应用的启示。

title: Classes of complex networks defined by role-to-role connectivity profiles
title_cn: 角色到角色的连接配置文件定义的复杂网络的类别
abstract: In physical, biological, technological and social systems, interactions between units give rise to intricate networks. These—typically non-trivial—structures, in turn, critically affect the dynamics and properties of the system. The focus of most current research on complex networks is, still, on global network properties. A caveat of this approach is that the relevance of global properties hinges on the premise that networks are homogeneous, whereas most real-world networks have a markedly modular structure. Here, we report that networks with different functions, including the Internet, metabolic, air transportation and protein interaction networks, have distinct patterns of connections among nodes with different roles, and that, as a consequence, complex networks can be classified into two distinct functional classes on the basis of their link type frequency. Importantly, we demonstrate that these structural features cannot be captured by means of often studied global properties.
abstract_cn: 在物理，生物，技术和社会系统中，单位之间的相互作用导致了错综复杂的网络。这些非典型的结构反过来又严重影响系统的动力学和特性。目前，大多数关于复杂网络的研究仍然集中在全局网络属性上。该方法的一个警告是，全局属性的相关性取决于网络是同质的前提，而大多数现实世界的网络具有明显的模块化结构。在这里，我们报告说，具有不同功能的网络（包括Internet，代谢，航空运输和蛋白质相互作用网络）在具有不同角色的节点之间具有不同的连接模式，因此，复杂的网络可以分为两个不同的功能类基于其链接类型的频率。重要的是，我们证明了这些结构特征无法通过经常研究的全局特性来捕获。
